title: Sausage, pasta and bean bake
ingredients: ['400g good quality pork sausages', '1 large onion, diced', '2 large celery sticks, sliced', '250g quick-cook penne pasta (pasta quills)', '400g can mixed beans, drained and rinsed 200g can sweetcorn, drained', '500g jar or carton passata', '1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce']
